data.title: Basic Elements and Tags
data.description: An overview of the fundamental HTML5 elements and tags used to structure and format web content.

items.title: Links
items.description: <a href='URL'>: To create links to other pages.

items.title: Lists
items.description: HTML provides different types of lists to organize content.

data.conclusion: Mastering these basic elements and tags is essential for creating well-structured and easily navigable web pages. These components form the backbone of HTML and are foundational for more advanced web development techniques.
